precautions: Avoid in women trying to conceive.
Avoid high doses with blood thinners.
Avoid if history of estrogen-sensitive cancers.
Long-term use may raise blood pressure.
High doses may cause weight gain.
Oil is toxic in large amounts.
Avoid internal use in kidney disease.
Toxic if ingested in large amounts.
May increase absorption of other drugs.
Causes blistering/sunburn if skin is exposed.
Do not use on open wounds; toxic if ingested raw.
May cause allergic reaction in sensitive individuals.
Highly toxic in crude form; use only in homeopathic dilution.
Causes severe rash in crude form.
Oil is neurotoxic in large amounts.
Can blister skin if left too long.
Oil is high in saturated fat.
Oil causes skin burning if undiluted.
Oil has strong smell; external use.
